main.description: List proposalLists. Filterable by: proposedTo, lists.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

proposedTo.description: Filter where proposedTo array contains this DID.

lists.description: Filter where lists array contains this AT-URI.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
